inclusion.criterion: Participants must agree to a voluntary admission to an inpatient research unit at the New York State Psychiatric Institute (NYSPI) for the infusion(s), for a brief stay, or longer if clinically necessary.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unstable medical condition or neurological illness, including baseline hypertension (BP>140/90) or significant history of cardiovascular illness.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man who was recently diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia in his past medical history.
